content: here s a cowl pattern where the stitch reminds me of fields of wheat i knit this with less than one skein of cascade 220 in color straw but any worsted weight will do i suggest a size 7 needle but use the needle size that gives you the correct gauge corrected abbreviations for t2b and t2f abbreviations t2b slip next stitch on cable needle and hold to the back of work knit next stitch purl stitch from cable needle t2f slip next stitch on cable needle and hold to the front of work purl next stitch knit stitch from cable needle
